title: Update download
body: I'm trying to download/update the game but when it comes to 80% it just starts droping in % plz help me!

replies.body: At this point in the patcher, your network is trying to download updates but something might be causing it to backtrack and fail.  I recommend the instructions in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your connection to the patching server.
